hints.content:
Multiplication and division are related:

$\begin{align}
\greenD{\text{number of groups}} \times \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \times \greenD{\text{number of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \greenD{\text{number of groups}} =\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} =\greenD{\text{number of groups}}
\end{align}$

In this fact family, the $\purpleC{\text{total}}$ is $\purpleC{35}$.

The $\maroonD{\text{size of the groups}}$ is ${\maroonD{5}}$.

![Tape diagram showing 35 is equal to question mark equal groups of 5](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4f96db1ebfcfd312e3c9924bb8efa202936c3633)

The $\greenD{\text{number of the groups}}$ is $\greenD{?}$.
The equation $\purpleC{35} = {\greenD{?}} \times {\maroonD{5}}$ can help us find the unknown number.

question.content:
**Create an equation to help us find the unknown number in ${?} = 35 \div 5$ .**

[[☃ dropdown 6]] $=$ [[☃ dropdown 4]] ${} \times 5$
